title: Sortilegio
text:
Sortilegio (literally "Sortilege", "Love Spell" in English-speaking markets) is a Mexican <a href="telenovela">telenovela</a> produced by <a href="Carla%20Estrada">Carla Estrada</a>, in her final telenovela for <a href="Televisa">Televisa</a> in 2009. and stars <a href="Jacqueline%20Bracamontes">Jacqueline Bracamontes</a> and <a href="William%20Levy%20%28actor%29">William Levy</a> as main protagonists, while <a href="David%20Zepeda">David Zepeda</a>, <a href="Chantal%20Andere">Chantal Andere</a>, <a href="Otto%20Sirgo">Otto Sirgo</a>, <a href="Azela%20Robinson">Azela Robinson</a>, <a href="Juli%C3%A1n%20Gil">Julián Gil</a> and <a href="Ana%20Brenda%20Contreras">Ana Brenda Contreras</a> are playing main villains/antagonists of the story.
From October 6, 2009 to February 17, 2010, <a href="Univision">Univisión</a> broadcast "Sortilegio" weeknights at 9pm/8c replacing "<a href="Ma%C3%B1ana%20es%20para%20siempre">Mañana es para siempre</a>". The last episode was broadcast on February 17, 2010 with "<a href="Coraz%C3%B3n%20salvaje%20%282009%20telenovela%29">Corazón salvaje</a>" replacing it on February 22, 2010. From July 30 to September 7, 2012, Univision broadcast 2 hour reruns of "Sortilegio" weekdays at 1pm/12c, replacing "<a href="Coraz%C3%B3n%20Apasionado">Corazón Apasionado</a>". From September 10 to October 19, 2012, reruns of "Sortilegio" were broadcast at 2pm/1c. The last episode was broadcast on October 19, 2012 with "<a href="Cuidado%20con%20el%20%C3%A1ngel">Cuidado con el ángel</a>" replacing it on October 22, 2012. This telenovela is a remake of "<a href="T%C3%BA%20o%20nadie">Tú o nadie</a>".
As of November 24, 2014 for the first time <a href="Galavisi%C3%B3n%20%28USA%29">Galavisión</a>. is debuting "Sortilegio" at 11am/10c, replacing one hour of "<a href="Amor%20Real">Amor Real</a>".
As of December 7, 2015 - April 15, 2016 <a href="TL%20Novelas">TL Novelas</a> broadcast 11:00, 17:00 and 23:00 replacing "<a href="Alma%20de%20hierro">Alma de hierro</a>", with "<a href="Fuego%20en%20la%20sangre%20%28telenovela%29">Fuego en la sangre</a>" replacing it the April 18.
As of March 21, 2016 for the first time <a href="UniM%C3%A1s">UniMás</a>. is debuting "Sortilegio" at 1pm/12c, 2 hour of special.
Plot.
Victoria had an <a href="affair">affair</a> with her husband Samuel's friend, Antonio Lombardo, resulting in the birth of <a href="twins">twins</a>, Bruno and Raquel. Antonio also had a son, Alejandro, with his wife Adriana. After their respective spouses died, they reunited and got married. However, they didn't tell their children that they are half-siblings, as that would reveal their infidelities. Instead they raised their children to recognize each other as step-siblings.
Years pass, and Bruno comes to be an irresponsible man who does not respect laws. Alejandro, on the other hand, is very responsible. Antonio prefers Alejandro over Bruno and decides that Alejandro should inherit his money when he passes away. Antonio and Victoria have a meeting at Bruno's high school about Bruno's behavior and are told that he is expelled. While leaving the school, Antonio is run over and killed. Bruno upon learning that Antonio left everything to Alejandro comes up with a plan to pretend to be Alejandro and marry Maria Jose, a sweet innocent girl and then kill Alejandro. Making Maria Jose a very rich widow. When news comes of Alejandro's death Maria Jose and her sister Paula travel to Merida for the funeral. Maria Jose is heart broken to learn that Alejandro has died. However, she also learns that the man she feel in love with is named Bruno and not Alejandro. Maria Jose is furious to learn that Bruno tricked her and wants nothing to do with his evil plan. Bruno then threatens to send her father to prison if she doesn't pretend to be Alejandro's widow. Maria Jose is trapped and reluctantly accepts to deceive everyone into believing that she did get married with Alejandro. Just as Bruno thinks he has gotten away with his plan, Alejandro returns alive and shocked to learn that his family thinks that he married Maria Jose. Alejandro must then discover the truth about his supposed marriage to Maria Jose, who he is slowly falling in love with. Thus begins a story of intrigue, sibling hatred and rivalry, two sons in love with and fighting for the love of the same women, corporate espionage, and twin sisters torn apart by circumstance.
